CATEGORIES:

Category    | Description                   |Number (BIN; DEC)| Mask(BIN;DEC)
Ground      | Collides with all             | 100, 4          | 111, 7
Semicolliders| Collides not with vehicle    | 010, 2          | 110, 6
Colliders    |No sem.col. collisions        | 001, 1          | 101, 5
